nodes.text: A male Keshiri florist lived on the planet Kesh around 3960 BBY, and frequently purchased plants from the farmer Jelph of Marisota. When the Sith Saber Orielle Kitai questioned the florist on the origin of his plants, the Keshiri lied by telling her that he had grown the plants himself. Kitai later followed the florist to Jelph's farm on her uvak. Thus, Orielle started a close friendship with Jelph which set a chain of events that led to the discovery of Jelph's Aurek-class tactical strikefighter and the Night of the Upside-Down Meteor, which led to the death of Grand Lord Lillia Venn and the Time of the Rot.
